trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed"></xref> and <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosing"></xref> events.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed> event occurs when a designer finalizes a transaction.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs"></xref> class, using the specified value that indicates whether the designer called <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit*> on the transaction.
A value indicating whether the transaction was committed.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs"></xref> class.
If `commit` is `true`, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs.LastTransaction%2A> property defaults to `true`.
A value indicating whether the transaction was committed.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this is the last transaction to close; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether this is the last transaction to close.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if this is the last transaction to close; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Indicates whether the designer called <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit*> on the transaction.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer called <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit*> on the transaction; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
